content.raw:
As a reference, we're using CC-BY-4.0 as the default on Fuel:

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Maybe we can change it here too. I don't think it's a big deal, considering only 3 models on our  database actually have a license right now :sweat_smile: 

~~~
$ grep -r "license" */model.config
mpl_right_arm/model.config:    http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
mpl_right_forearm/model.config:    http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
pioneer3at/model.config:  <license>Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported</license>
powerplant/model.config:  <license></license>
~~~
content.html:
